extraction.title: Export to Slack crashes app
extraction.description: Can export to email no problem, but if I attempt to export to Slack the OwnTracks app crashes. Report sent.
extraction.comments: Whom did you send the report to? Slack? (Just kidding :-) Don't know - just clicked Report on the exception dialog! Funnily, if I export to Slack, OwnTracks lives but Slack crashes :D Yep - not a big deal this one - once I figured out I could export to email OK I was happy :). It crashes Slack but not OwnTracks so it's not our problem.
